name: Albany Latin Festival
description: Celebrate Latin culture with live music, dance performances, and authentic food vendors featuring tacos and more.

name: Taco Tuesday Pop-Up
venue: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen, Albany, NY
description: Weekly Taco Tuesday featuring unique taco recipes with locally sourced ingredients and craft beers.

name: Albany Riverfront Jazz Festival
description: A day-long jazz festival showcasing regional and national artists along the scenic Hudson River.

name: Opening Celebration at Toro Cantina
description: Grand opening of Toro Cantina, offering modern Mexican cuisine with a focus on creative tacos and margaritas.

name: Albany Taco Fest 2025
description: Celebrate the Capital Region's best taco vendors with live music, family activities, and craft beers. A diverse lineup of local taquerias showcasing authentic flavors.

name: Capital Repertory Theatre: 'Rent'
description: Experience the iconic musical 'Rent' performed live at Capital Rep, a staple of Albany's theater scene, exploring love and struggle in NYC.

name: Toro Cantina Taco Takeover
description: A special event at Toro Cantina featuring unique taco creations with fusion flavors, paired with tequila tastings and live mariachi music.

name: Fusion Food Night at Toro Cantina
description: Explore unique taco fusions blending Mexican and Asian flavors in a vibrant atmosphere.

name: Art on Lark 2025
description: Annual street festival showcasing local artists, crafts, live performances, and unique food stalls.

name: Fusion Feast at Villa Di Valletta
venue: Villa Di Valletta, 6 Marion Ave, Albany, NY
description: A special dining event blending Italian and Middle Eastern flavors, featuring a curated menu by guest chefs.

name: Contemporary Art Exhibit Opening
venue: Albany Institute of History & Art, 125 Washington Ave, Albany, NY
description: Explore new works by regional artists focusing on themes of identity and environment.

name: Taco Tuesday at Toro Cantina
venue: Toro Cantina, 111 Wolf Rd, Albany, NY
description: Weekly event with authentic street-style tacos, margarita specials, and a lively atmosphere.

name: Sculpture in the Streets Exhibit
description: Public art installation featuring large-scale sculptures by regional and national artists.
